snippet: A soldier accused of driving Pvt. Danny Chen, a Chinese-American from Manhattan, to suicide last fall while deployed in Afghanistan received a six-month prison sentence Monday.
lead_paragraph: A soldier accused of driving Pvt. Danny Chen, a Chinese-American from Manhattan, to suicide last fall while deployed in Afghanistan received a six-month prison sentence Monday.

headline.seo: Soldier Gets Prison and Discharge in Case Over Pvt. Danny Chen’s Suicide
headline.main: Soldier Accused in Suicide Gets Prison
headline.print_headline: Soldier Accused in Suicide Gets Prison
